compatibility.notes: The Ruby license is permissive and allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Include copyright notices and disclaimers in all copies.
Provide instructions for obtaining the original software when distributing modified or binary forms.
State any changes made to the software if modifications are distributed.
license.name: Ruby
obligations: Duplicate all original copyright notices and associated disclaimers when distributing verbatim copies.

Place modifications in the Public Domain or make them Freely Available, or use the modified software only within your organization, or give non-standard binaries non-standard names with instructions on where to get the original software, or make other distribution arrangements with the author.

Distribute binaries with instructions on where to get the original distribution, or accompany the distribution with the machine-readable source, or give non-standard binaries non-standard names with instructions, or make other distribution arrangements with the author.
